DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether eat Kellogg 's Nutri-Grain cereal bar increase calcium intake healthy adult woman .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Calcium-fortified Cereal Bars Dietary Calcium Intake Women
DOC.detailed_description: The average intake calcium woman United States diet ( 800 mg/day ) Recommended Dietary Allowance ( 1000 mg/day age 18 50 year , 1200 mg/day age 50 year ) , increase risk develop osteoporosis . Consumption two calcium-fortified cereal bar per day may feasible way increase dietary intake calcium . This study use Kellogg 's Nutri-Grain® cereal bar , provide 200 mg calcium per bar , total 400 mg/day .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 old Able speak , read , understand English Able consume Kellogg 's NutriGrain® cereal bar Consumption calcium supplement calciumcontaining medication Regular consumption 2 Kellogg 's NutriGrain® cereal bar per month Currently pregnant plan become pregnant course study Liver disease Kidney disease Gastrointestinal disease ( celiac disease , ulcerative colitis , Crohn 's disease ) Have history bariatric surgery Had major cardiovascular event ( stroke myocardial infarction ) Undergoing treatment cancer exception nonmelanoma cancer Following weight control diet , disease specific diet , vegan diet Have diagnose eat disorder Allergic ingredient study bar
